alfredsnippet.snippet:
"It is tempting to say that the Hertzsprung-Russell Diagram supports the stellar model just described. Of course it does. The model was specifically designed to 'explain' ('conform to') the diagram. If it did not, it would never have reached a place in scientific literature. Good, independent tests of the model are scarce."

- William R. Corliss, Some Mysteries of the Universe, (1969) p.85
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - It Should Surprise Nobody that the Hertzspurng-Russell Diagram Fits the Stellar Model
